title: 怎么给玩家播放原版唱片
author: Meteor___

replies.author: William_Shi
replies.txt_content:
https://bukkit.windit.net/javadoc/org/bukkit/Sound.html

有唱片声音的枚举
比如说
player.playSound(player.getLocation(),Sound.MUSIC_DISC_11,10,10);复制代码

注：云编程，不一定完全正确

replies.author: Meteor___
